## Bio

[INRAE](https://www.inrae.fr/) Research in Statistical Learning \@ [MIA Paris Saclay](https://mia-ps.inrae.fr/) in the [SOLsTIS](https://mia-ps.inrae.fr/solstis)(Statistical mOdelling and Learning for environnemenT and lIfe Sciences) team.

-   Co-head of the [StatOmique](https://statomique.netlify.app/about/) group

-   Member of the INRAE CATI [**B**ioinformatics for **O**mics and meta**O**mics of **M**icrobes](https://cati-boom-public.pages.mia.inra.fr/site-officiel/)

-   Head of [StateoftheR](https://stateofther.netlify.app/)

## Research

I am specialized in the development and application of **statistical learning methods for ecology and life sciences** more particularly around omics data and microbial ecology application. More details [here](research.qmd).

## Contact

My lab is located at AgroParisTech - INRAE - Campus Agro Paris-Saclay in Palaiseau near Paris.
